meanings.definition: Causing or likely to cause harm or damage
meanings.sent1: Running with scissors can be injurious to your health.
meanings.sent2: Excessive sun exposure is injurious to the skin.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy may be injurious to your teeth.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs can be as injurious as playing with fire.
meanings.sent5: The sharp edges of the broken glass were clearly injurious.

meanings.sent1: Smoking is injurious to your lungs.
meanings.sent2: Not wearing a helmet while biking can be injurious to your head.
meanings.sent3: Staying up late watching TV might be injurious to your sleep schedule.
meanings.sent4: Procrastination can be as injurious as a slow leak in a boat.
meanings.sent5: The effects of the toxic chemicals were undeniably injurious.
